meanings.definition: To gather or assemble a group of people.
meanings.sent1: We are kithing for a picnic in the park tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys kithing her friends for game nights.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors are kithing for a barbecue this weekend.
meanings.sent4: The teacher is kithing all the students for a field trip.
meanings.sent5: Kithing for a surprise party can be so exciting!

meanings.definition: The act of hosting a gathering or party.
meanings.sent1: The kithing at the community center was a huge success.
meanings.sent2: She took charge of the kithing for her sister's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The annual kithing at the park always draws a big crowd.
meanings.sent4: The kithing for the charity event was well-organized.
meanings.sent5: Attending a kithing can be a great way to meet new people.
